dialogueContent.words: The Holo-distribution facility should be just ahead of you, Commander.

Indeed. Ironwood Productions uses this facility to mass-produce Holovid entertainment for combat enthusiasts across the Inner Sphere. They have everything we'll need to issue the Steel Beast a challenge he cannot refuse.
I would advise your lance to scout the facility before engaging it. Ironwood Productions has security contracts with a number of local mercenary outfits, and resistance is likely to be heavy.
Understood, Graf Stieglitz-Bradford. We'll take it from here.

You win, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}—Ironwood Productions is officially crying uncle. The Holo-distribution facility is yours for as long as you need it. If you want to call out the Steel Beast, we can help you do that! In fact, we'd be happy to.
I'll bet you will. Someone in your fight promotions department is probably doing a happy little dance right now.
We know a moneymaking opportunity when we hear it. When you're ready, come on in—we've got a dozen holocameras ready to roll.
Excellent. This victory brings us a step closer to justice for my murdered nephew. I suggest that you prepare yourselves. You'll be receiving the Steel Beast's challenge soon enough!
We just got our asses kicked by a bunch of fight promoters. I don't know if we'll ever live this down. Either way, we're done here.
[GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
I am inbound for landing, Commander.
Huh. Looks like Ironwood Productions shelled out for point-defense turrets. I was not expecting that.
Can't say I didn't warn you.
Okay… you should now have eyes on the facility.

And we have eyes on you. I'd advise against doing anything foolish, Commander. This studio is better defended than most Frontier military bases, and I'd like nothing better than to justify our defense budget.
Sounds like we're in for a fight, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. There's no time like the present, so let's get to it.

longDescription: You heard the man. Let's get this job done.

objectiveList.description: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
objectiveList.title: Scout the Holo-Distribution Facility

objectiveList.description: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Corporate Security Forces

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
objectiveList.title: Capture the Sponsor's Holo-Distribution Facility

objectiveList.description: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Corporate Security Forces

objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
objectiveList.title: Pacify the Area around the Holo-Distribution Facility

objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Security Reinforcements

objectiveList.description: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Facility's Turrets

shortDescription: Ironwood Productions' Holo-distribution facility is just ahead of you, Commander. Take it, and we will use it to ensure that the Steel Beast hears your challenge.
